plugins.microphonePermission: Allow Voice Fit to use your microphone for voice logging.
plugins.speechRecognitionPermission: Allow Voice Fit to recognize your speech for workout logging.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Voice Fit to access your location to track your runs and outdoor workouts.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow Voice Fit to access your location in the background to track your runs.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow Voice Fit to access your location while using the app to track your runs.

infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: Voice Fit uses speech recognition to log your workouts hands-free.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Voice Fit needs microphone access to hear your workout commands.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Voice Fit needs access to your location to track your runs and outdoor workouts.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Voice Fit needs access to your location while using the app to track your runs.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Voice Fit needs access to your location in the background to track your runs.
